about_the_game:
This game is a mix of casual life simulator and dungeon exploration with the elements of fast combat. you can do farming, gardening, builging your home, crafting furniture, tools and even weapons and armor which can then be used for upgrading your character to go deeper into new unexplored places.
Currently there a few mechanics are already working. You can hunt animals that you meat in the forest, some will attack you, and some will try to flee.


You can then cook their meet and satisfy your hunger, or you can use cooked ingredients to create meals that not only heal you but add additional buffs.


But before you can cook anything you need to gather recources like stone and wood. For wood you can pick up branches or cut down trees.


after that you can craft campfires, furniture and even houses.


You can find many different clothes, armors or weapons. The variety is huge.


or you can create your own gear, but special gear will require special resources which can be found deep in the mountains, caves or dungeons.


The focus is exploration. you can find many interesting and unusual animals, creatures, meeting native people who can give lots of various quests. depending on your action and reaction you can change people moods and the way they comunicate with you, which will add certain quests and remove others. You will be able to create a place to call home, build house and even create a town where new people will gather and with your permission live in your town and work for you to make your life easier. This world constantly changes, new people arrive, other dies... will you adapt or fight for a better future?

short_description: A new world exploration where you can do anything you want. Crafting, bulding, hunting, fishing, mining, farming, cooking, visiting villages, meeting native people, trading and exploring dungeons for better loot and uncovering mysteries of ruins and buried cities
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Lithuanian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
